#line 25 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/16a_SphereTracing/Shaders/D3D12/fstri.vert"
static const float2 positions[3] = {
    float2(-1.0, 1.0),
    float2(-1.0, -3.0),
    float2( 3.0, 1.0)
};

float4 main(uint index : SV_VertexID) : SV_POSITION
{
    return float4(positions[index], 0.0, 1.0);
}
